item.title: BCB BANCORP INC 10-K
item.description: BCB BANCORP INC, which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 09, 2022 had 33761 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 442 instances 31 - 380 instances company - 376 instances december - 371 instances bank - 342 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
